title: 820-01598 cpu kernal crashing
message:
This arrived with no drop or liquid damage. Customer said the machine just randomly started kernel crashing one day. The panic occurs within a few seconds of login or within a few minutes after login. Board looks pristine. Passed Apple Diagnostic.

What should be checked next? Should the  CPU mosfets be replaced?? See attached photo.

title: 820-01598 cpu kernal crashing
message:
Try DFU restore, if no important data to recover.
If need data, check if you can access it in Target Disk mode.

Does it stay on in boot menu?

title: 820-01598 cpu kernal crashing
message: If you hold option key yes it stays on then. Will back up data and try DFU restore

title: 820-01598 cpu kernal crashing
message:
shotgun the cpu power fets.
Just fixed one of these yesterday replacing fets.

title: 820-01598 cpu kernal crashing
message: Forgot to update post but DFU restore did end up fixing this
